title: MPH: To the man trying to fill Christian Horner's shoes: good luck!
summary: Laurent Mekies arrives as Red Bull F1 team principal with a series of immediate challenges to solve and long-term issues to tackle. He'll either sink or swim, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Who is the new team principal of Red Bull Racing as of the latest season?
What kind of challenges is Laurent Mekies expected to face as the new team principal?
Which team did Christian Horner lead prior to Laurent Mekies' appointment?
